thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Internship - Marketing - Pro Sports

title: Internship - Marketing - Pro Sports
text: Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Assist with team publications and marketing efforts including game programs, newspaper and other marketing collateral and advertising materials such as flyers, coupons, sponsorship proposal packets   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
